title: @measure_in2out
description: Compute thickness of mask using in2out method.

surfset.title: Surface dataset
surfset.description: Surface dataset onto which to map thickness (probably a pial/gray matter surface).

outdir.title: Output directory
outdir.description: Output directory. If not specified, in2out_thickdir is used.

resample.title: Resample input
resample.description: Resample input to mm in millimeters (put a number here). Set this to half a voxel or "auto". No resampling is done by default. Resampling is highly recommended for most 1mm data.

increment.title: Increment in millimeters
increment.description: Test thickness at increments of sub-voxel distance. Default is 1/4 voxel minimum distance (in-plane).

surfsmooth.title: Surface smoothing in millimeters
surfsmooth.description: Smooth surface map of thickness by mm millimeters. Default is 6 mm.

maxthick.title: Maximum thickness in millimeters
maxthick.description: Search for maximum thickness value of mm millimeters. Default is 6 mm.

depthsearch.title: Depth search in millimeters
depthsearch.description: Map to surface by looking for max along mm millimeter normal vectors. Default is 3 mm.

maskinoutvals.title: Mask inside and outside values
maskinoutvals.description: Use v1 for value of mask, v2 and v3 for inside and outside mask values (e.g., '1 -2 -1').

keep_temp_files.title: Keep temporary files
keep_temp_files.description: Do not delete the intermediate files (for testing).

surfsmooth_method.title: Surface smoothing method
surfsmooth_method.description: Heat method used for smoothing surfaces. Default is HEAT_07 but HEAT_05 is also useful for some models.

fs_cort_dir.title: FreeSurfer SUMA directory
fs_cort_dir.description: Use FreeSurfer SUMA directory from @SUMA_Make_Spec_FS for processing.
